sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Box, Flex, Heading, Grid, Divider, Icon } from '@chakra-ui/core'; import FinanceStats from '../FinanceStats'; import logo from '../../assets/images/logo-wisdon.png'; const Header = () => { return ( {/* Wisdon */} Empresa skarlata web crafting bruno cesar da silva Bruno.skarlata@gmail.com ) } export default Header;
